short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will make the layout of the page change as the text size increases so that the page is more readable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to increase the text's font size (and line height) to make it more readable. When the main section of text has too few characters on a line to make it easily legible the page layout will change to make it more readable.
